full_summary:
# Human Factors Professionals
### Solicitation Number: R95563
#### Tender Closing Date: March 8, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

### Details

The Canadian government, through Shared Services Canada, is seeking proposals from qualified Human Factors Professionals to provide expert services in the field of occupational therapy.

### Background

Shared Services Canada requires occupational therapy services to support the needs of government employees. The recommended period of performance for this contract is April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024.

### Qualification Criteria

Bidders must possess a bachelor's degree in occupational therapy or a related field and have a minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in occupational therapy.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the bidder's qualifications, expertise, and experience in occupational therapy, as well as their ability to meet the required service level agreement.

### Procurement Method

This is a competitive procurement, and bidders are required to submit a proposal in response to the solicitation.

### Contracting Entity

Shared Services Canada is the contracting entity for this procurement.

### Point of Contact

Roxanne Pelletier
roxanne.s.pelletier@ssc-spc.gc.ca
### Download Solicitation Documents

You can download the solicitation documents at the following links:

* [Human Factors Professionals - RFP 95563 - PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/9e317467a727ff8342fa97302c7c30e3/rfp_-_95563_-_human_factors_professionals_hfp.pdf)
* [Human Factors Professionals - RFP 95563 - DOCX](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/fcbee02646e7572d07507b967efa5cf3/rfp_-_95563_-_human_factors_professionals_hfp.docx)

Note: The contract duration is from April 1, 2023, to March 31, 2024.
